messages.message:
*Hi team,*
Do you know how the `inmodev-use2-sandbox-infra-services-eks-cluster` in `instabase-monitoring-dev` account is managed?
Is it managed via Terraform? If so, could you please point me to the relevant Terraform configuration?
Iâ€™m planning to upgrade the EKS cluster to *version 1.30* to ensure it stays out of the extended support window.
Thanks!

Hey @abhishekk
I believe @Parvez can only confirm this.
cc @astpierre for visibility. Andrew has worked on upgrading our EKS clusters to 1.30 recently
